note.p: Birth: Buttington, near Welshpool, Powys, Wales (26 December 1837)
Career: Geologist, on the Geological Survey of Great Britain (1861-1869); Lecturer in Geology, Owens College, Manchester (1870); travelled in America and Australia
Obituaries: Proc Roy Soc Series B 1931 vol 107 pp xxiii-xxvi, plate, by Sir Arthur Smith Woodward
References: Geoffrey Tweedale and Timothy Procter, 'New Documentary Evidence on the Career of Sir William Boyd Dawkins, FRS (1837-1929)' in NR 1991 vol 45 pp 193-200, plate
R W Home, 'The Royal Society and the Empire: the colonial and Commonwealth Fellowship. Part 2. After 1847' in NR 2003 vol 57 pp 47-84
Notes: John Lubbock has signed the election certificate twice
